case.state: By the way you can all call me... Flutter!
Nice to meet you! I'm Flutter.
So here we are...the Inventory, At least, I think that's what this is.
Moth?! I'm a butterfly! When have you ever seen a moth sparkle like this!?
I am NOT a moth! I am a butterfly! Moths aren't this brightly colored! Are they?
What's that thing, Jolyne?
I do see something behind you, Jolyne. What is it?
I am NOT a moth! Moths are dusty! I am sparkly! I'm a butterfly!
Moth?! I am a butterfly!
This place reminds me of Port Puerto.
Oh, wow! It's a lot like the refreshment bar at the Port Puerto beach!
The beach is a nice place. Calm yet exciting!
Being at the beach makes me think of Olivia...
Ooh! This is just like the Origin Island hot springs!
This'll be so relaxing! Just like the hot springs on Origin Island!
Whoa! It's like a castle in here!
Wow! This place is furnished like a castle!
What a cozy little room.
I like this room. It feels welcoming.
There's so much that I could learn from this place!
I wonder which of these books are the most interesting...
Ooh. It's like the deep Elderwood here.
It's a little hard to see when it's this dark...
I want to know about all the different kinds of Life, so I'll be going around asking everyone!
I can't wait to see what this place has got in store for us!
I hope that we can all become the best of friends!
I'm here to gather wishes from everyone!
Oh, it's actually very interesting, Tomo! It feels so light and ethereal!
Oh, I inherited them, Tomo. My mother and father are magical too!
I got them from my parents, Tomo. My dad created the world, and my mom gave happiness to living things!
I'm good for now.
I don't need to trade any cards.
I'm happy with what I have.
I'm good for now.
I don't need to trade any cards.
I'm happy with what I have.
Just one should work.
I'll take one new card, please.
One card will do.
I'll exchange these ~cards~ cards.
These ~cards~ cards can go.
Uh, take these ~cards~ cards back.
Let's see... these ones!
I'll trade these ~cards~ cards.
I think these ~cards~ can go...
I won't need these ~cards~ cards.
I'll swap these ~cards~ cards out.
I'll take ~cards~ new cards, please!
Um, maybe these ~cards~ cards?
Uh, I think I'll go with these ~cards~.
I think I can lose these ~cards~ cards.
Cool! All of these have the same symbol on them!
Wow! The same shape is on all of these!
Ooh, I'm so excited! I wonder what everyone else's cards are like!
I think this hand is good! This hand is good, right?
Wonderful!
Amazing!
Wowee!
I couldn't have asked for anything better!
Oh wow! Thank you kindly, dealer!
Wow! These are great!
Amazing! I'll definitely win with these!
No problems here!
These are definitely good!
These cards look good!
I'm not out of the game yet!
I can still win!
There's still hope for me!
Just in time!
Maybe I could make a comeback!
I haven't lost just yet!
This is amazing!
I got really lucky this time!
Oh wow! This is perfect!
I have nothing to complain about.
I'm sure this will be good enough.
This is even better than I was hoping for!
Oh! This is just what I needed!
Perfect!
What a stroke of luck!
I think I'm getting better at this game!
Great! I should be safe with these.
I've got nothing to worry about.
Are these good? It's hard to hold them as a butterfly.
These seem alright.
I'm not sure I understand the game yet. Is this good?
Hmmmm... maybe?
I think this is okay.
I don't think these are bad...
Hmmm. This is fine.
These cards aren't so bad.
This should work.
I think this will be fine.
These are good. Or are they? Wait... yeah, they're fine.

Hmmm. I can't be sure.

Maybe. Just maybe.
What will happen with these?
These might be enough to keep me in. Let's see what happens.
These might work, but there's only one way to find out.
This should be enough.
I shouldn't need any more than this.
I think this is enough to keep me safe.
These are good enough.
Great! Wait, never mind. It's not as good as I thought.

Let's just see what happens.

Well, it's not the best hand, but it's not the worst either.

(I wonder if Laura's broken out of the castle again. I hope she's having fun.)
(I wonder if Queen Ophelia has made anymore apple pie lately. A sweet snack would be nice.)
(I wonder what Noelia is up to right now. I hope she isn't causing trouble for anyone.)
(I wonder what kind of clothes Madame Purl would make for everyone here.)
(I wonder if Hazel's classes are going well. Those kids always seem pretty eager to learn from her.)
(I wonder what Jinx is doing right now. Magician things, or cat things?)
(I wonder if Jude has gotten braver since our last adventure. It's a shame he doesn't realize how strong he is.)
(I wonder if Cervantes has seen any good performances recently. He's always in The Crown, after all.)
(I wonder how Duglas and Mary are doing. I hope there haven't been anymore misunderstandings.)
(I wonder if Fizz has made any neat accessories lately. I wonder if anyone here would like one.)
(I wonder how Flamel never hurts himself when he only makes bombs.)
(I wonder what Porthos is doing right now... Actually, no. He's probably eating.)
(I wonder how Monika is doing right now. Hopefully her dad hasn't lost his passion as a Woodcutter again.)
(I wonder if Fern ever plays with Lucky. He seems like such an energetic dog after all.)
(I wonder if Woody has gotten used to being a Life Master yet. He's so talented, so why is he nervous?)
(I wonder if Isaac has caught any big fish lately. I should ask the next time I see him.)
(I wonder if Andy ever got to throw that year-long feast he's always talking about. Why is he always trying to do that anyway?)
(I wonder if Olivia's made any big discoveries. I hope her governor work isn't keeping her too busy for pirate stuff.)
(I wonder why Noelia acts so differently when she's with Robin. She even calls him by his name.)
(I hope Damien is doing okay. Hopefully his mom isn't working him too hard.)
(I wonder if Rupert ever managed to deliver that love letter. I still don't understand how anyone can have such bad luck.)
(I wonder if Odin has gotten any better at talking to people. I never would've expected him to be so shy.)
Hey, everyone? I was wondering if you've ever had a moment where someone wanted to reward you for helping them, but you really just couldn't accept what they wanted to give you.
Say, is anyone here a fan of performances? Like plays or performances.
I'm wondering, have any of you ever known someone who seemed way too young to be doing a certain job, but it turned out that they were actually really good at it?
None of you have to answer this if you don't want to, but have any of you ever accidentally created a really big misunderstanding before?
So, does anyone here have any pets? If you do, what are they like?
Does anyone here really like custom accessories? Or maybe a specific kind of accessory?
Say, do any of you know someone who always seems to insist on doing the most dangerous thing possible? And somehow they're always just fine?
I want to know what all of you think. What do you think it takes to make someone a good teacher?
Has anyone else here ever been fishing? It can actually be very exciting!
I'd like to ask, have any of you met someone, and immediately found them to be nothing like what you were expecting?
So, has anyone ever known someone who seemed to be stuck doing a job that really just didn't suit them?
Do any of you know a person who seems like they just can't be stopped? Like, once they decide to do something, no one can stop them from doing it?
This might be a little personal, but have any of you ever seen someone close to you just, slowly lose their passion for something they once loved? How did you deal with that?
I'm curious, do any of you have any family members you seem to cause a lot of trouble? How do you feel about the things that they do?
Say, have any of you ever met someone who seemed like they were really scary and quiet at first, but they turned out to just be shy?
Hey, everyone? If the people that you loved told you that one thing was best for you, but in your heart, you felt that something else would be better, which one would you trust?
Does anyone here really like sugary stuff? If so, what's your favorite kind of sweet?
Everyone, I was wondering, what's the best meal you've ever had?
I'd like to ask, do you all prefer your clothes to be custom made for you? Or do you think clothes made normally are better?
Hey, do any of you know someone who acts very differently when they're with a specific person? Why do you think they do that?
Say, have any of you ever met someone who seemed to have absolutely terrible luck?
So, have any of you ever met someone who was really talented at something, but still had no confidence in themselves? What do you think makes them so nervous?
Well, Meia... the easy explanation is magic, but you probably want to know more than that, right?
It's just a special power that my father granted to me, Meia.
Ooh! I have, Aella! It was wild! But I made a lot of friends in the process and that's what's really important!
I have, Aella! It was a lot of fun! In fact, that's why I'm here, to have more fun!
Luck boosting? I'm not wearing anything like that. Only elemental enhancers.
I'm not wearing anything like that. All of my equipment is meant to make my magic better, Dust.
I know, right, Pit! Hot springs are just so relaxing!
What do you mean "ruin it", Pit? We're not going to ruin anything by playing a friendly, fun game.
But, don't you need your hands for most jobs you do?
I'm not sure I understand, Spooky. What kind if job do you have?
Well, I spent a lot of time in the Castele library Aella, and I thought that all the books were pretty interesting.
Oh! There were plenty of interesting books in the Castele library, Aella! I can bring you with me the next time I go if you want.
Oh, wow. I wonder how it compares to the wands my friend makes.
Wow! That sounds like something really rare, Akko. How'd you get it?
Oh wow. You're very different from the zombies I usually see. You're very composed, Saki.
Oh wow! You're so much more lively than all the other zombies I've seen, Saki!
Well, hello, Alter Ego. Are you a sentient tome?
Hello, Alter Ego. You remind me of the Tome of Shadows in the Al Maajik library.
I... don't think it is, Natsuki. I can see them. They're pink with a strawberry pattern.
Natsuki, are you sure? Because I'm pretty sure I can see them.
Of course I can play! Just... give me a second to get my cards in order.
Yes I can play! I just... might have some trouble holding these...
Ooh! If you need help getting them to smile, I'd be happy to help, Akko!
I can help you get those smiles, Akko!
Of course I would, Tomoko! We all make mistakes, after all.
I've lied to my friends before, Tomoko. But they all forgave me, so of course I could forgive you!
That's incredible, Akko! It's wonderful that you're pursuing your greatest wish in Life!
That's amazing, Akko! You must be so happy working towards your Wish.
Well, I'm not even sure they can feel pain, since they're basically just a doll, but I thought that we had broken him for a minute.
It was weird, since it wasn't a person, it was a doll. Though, I was afraid we had broken him at first.
Well, you shouldn't drink too much at once. A small dish is usually enough.
You can't have too much of it at once, just a little bit is enough for me.
I didn't understand a lot of that, but it sounds like you're busy, Meia.
I, uh... I see. Do you really have time to be playing a game like this, Meia?
Oh, well that's a relief. Not that you would be unarmed! Just that nothing awful would happen.
I'm sure you'll be fine without it, Meia. You should just try to have fun with the game.
And... are you actually happy with that Meia? And don't say your happiness doesn't matter.
Are you okay with that, Meia? With the fact that you're only ever living the bare minimum that Life has to offer?
Meia, this is going to sound strange to you, but I don't think this is the same "earth" as the one you're familiar with.
If that were true, Meia, don't you think you would've run into some sort of trouble by now?
Actually, Meia... I'm not from earth either.
Uh, Meia? I'm not from earth.
Even if something does happen, I can protect you and heal you, Meia. So don't be so tense.
Okay, but this is a place where people come to have fun. So... maybe it would be best if you tried to blend in.
Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that, Emi.
Oh my. I'm sorry that happened to you, Emi.
Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that, Emi.
Oh my. I'm sorry that happened to you, Emi.
It's not stupid, Fidget. It's just... unique.
That's not very nice, Fidget. It... goes well with the rest of his clothes.

Is it really, Joey? Who made it?
A school for magic? Oh, so it's like what Jinx does!

What's a "Yebisu", Misato?
And, uh, what exactly is 3.0 + 1.0, Misato?

That? What is that, Misato?
And, uh, what is that, Misato?

Is that bad, Misato?
Whitewings? What are those, Catria?
What are the Whitewings, Catria?
What's that thing, Meia? What're you doing with it?
What's that thing on your arm, Meia?
Why? What would happen if it did malfunction, Meia?
And, uh... if it did malfunction, Meia, what would happen?
Um, I'm not sure you understand how magic is used, Amy..
Oh, you're going to sing! I'm ready to listen, Amy!
Well, uh... what does "kinky" mean, Amy?
Uh, actually Jessie, I technically am a human.
Well, despite the whole butterfly thing, I'm still technically human, Jessie.
Hmm?
Anything? Well, I guess I could buy a few presents for everyone.
Is there someone who's always judging you, Jessie?
Oh! I see! ...what are "cigarettes", Jessie?
Well, it's good that you try to be nice, Amy. You probably shouldn't swear though.
Actually, I don't know, Amy. You completely lost me.
I don't masturbate very often, Amy.
Being with? I have plenty of friends that I love going on adventures with, but I haven't been on any dates. My sister has, though.
[intently listening]
That was beautifully, Amy! Yes! I love caring for people in any way that I can!
You mean in a fight, Brock? I usually just use my magic.
Well, I don't use any weapons, Brock. I just use my magic.
A talking sword? Just like Durandal! What kind of legendary blacksmith forged you, Ahrah?
Hey! I know another talking sword! It was made by a legendary Blacksmith apparently. Is it the same for you, Ahrah?
Oh, well Fidget, you're a very interesting... uh, what are you?
That's neat, but, what exactly are you, Fidget?
Well, never a frog, but I've been bitten by my fair share of dragons...
Oh. So, your mother is gone too, Estelle?
Your mom is gone too, Estelle?
Oh. So, your mother is gone too, Estelle?
Your mom is gone too, Estelle?
A Thompson- what? I don't know what that is, Tomo.
And uh... what exactly is that, Tomo?
So then, is this like a date for the two of you, then?
Oh. So, why did she seem upset, Miko?
Of course I can talk, why wouldn't I, Rin?
Why yes, I did! Nice to meet you! I'm Flutter!
I'm here to enjoy a fun game! What about you, Rin?
This game seemed like fun! So I decided to join in!
Magic, Jessie! It's simple as long as you practice!
It's a spell that my father gave to me, Jessie!
I do it because I love Life, Tomoko. And I enjoy seeing people living their best Life!
No, just the butterfly, Tomoko. Though, my friend will collect some cicadas from time to time.
Funny you ask, Fidget. I actually have had to do something like that before. And I did, so... yes?
I'd have to say "yes" to that, Fidget. Mainly because something like that has happened before.
I would give them a hug, and reassure them until they felt better, Fidget.
I would hug them, and let them know that it wasn't their fault, Fidget.
That's easy, Fidget! Sugared water!
I love sugared water, Fidget!
Backdoor? I mean, if the main door is locked, then why not?
The backdoor of where, Jessie?
Well, I have a secret or two, but I wouldn't call them "dark."
I don't have any deep dark secrets, but I have a few regular secrets, Jessie/
Hmmm... The whole butterfly thing was my main secret, to be honest.
You mean, besides the butterfly thing, Jessie? No, not really.
Family is extremely important to me. Even if we don't always get along, we all still love each other.
Family is one of the things I hold closest to my heart, Jessie. My sister, my father, my mother... they're all very important to me.
Family is extremely important to me. Even if we don't always get along, we all still love each other.
Family is one of the things I hold closest to my heart, Jessie. My sister, my father, my mother... they're all very important to me.
I try to avoid lying as much as I can, Jessie. Lying makes my heart ache.
I've done something like that once before, Jessie, and it made me feel awful.
Is that a lot? I don't know. I'm not usually the person handling money.
I'm not sure... What is "porn", Jessie?
"Porn"? What's that, Jessie?
Smokers? You mean like the cooking tool? I mean, they're okay, but an oven usually works better, right?
Smokers? Well, the food that gets made with them usually comes out a little dusty, but it's still pretty good.
People can change, Jessie. Of course I wouldn't hold it against them.
I wouldn't want other people doing that to me, so I wouldn't do it to them, Jessie.
Wait?! Noelia!? Why are you here?
Noelia!? Why- Where are you going?!
I don't know what "slutty" means, Amy, but anyone can have fun if they want.
"Slutty"? Wait, what exactly do you mean by "sex drive"?
Is it really that surprising, Amy? I've just never met anyone that I felt a really special connection with, Amy.
Oh? You have a daughter, Jessie? What's she like?
A goldfish! What was its name, Jessie?
Yoga? What's yoga, Jessie? You make it sound like it's painful, Jessie.
Make her more adventurous? How have you been doing that, Jessie?
W-what? What happened to your daughter, Jessie?
You said that you usually see a cat on your way home, Tomoko? Even if it's not yours, do you still have a name for it?
You said something about a brother, Tomoko? That's cute. It reminds me of me and my sister.
Hey, Tomo? Earlier you said your friends sometimes help you dress up? How does that usually go for you?
Tomoko? You mentioned a friend named Yoshido earlier. How did the two of you get to know each other?
So, Tomoko. You mentioned earlier that you had a friend named Megumi who really helped you out. What exactly did she do?
Hey, Brock? Earlier you said something about a girl named Nita and... a bear? What did you mean by that?
Hey, Brock? Earlier you said something about someone named Tara. Something about seeing under their robes. Could you explain that a little more?
Brock? What were you talking about earlier when you mentioned someone with a detachable head?
Wait, I thought you didn't know any men, Meia.
Man? I thought you hated men, Meia.
Hey, Meia? With that thing you said before about men, do you ever wonder if anything else you were taught was a lie?
Well, I spend a lot of time as a butterfly, Meia. So I kinda just... forgot to change first...
Well, this game seemed like fun, and I wanted to play, Meia. But it would be pretty alarming for goddess to just show up and start playing. I figured the butterfly was better.
Traveling is easier for me as a butterfly, Meia. When I got here, I sorta... forgot to change back.
Why can't we still be friends, L'Arachel? Isn't that the whole point of a game?
What do you mean "better circumstances", L'Arachel? We're already playing a friendly game together, aren't we?
Yeah, I know how to use magic. Why do you ask, L'Arachel?
Of course I can use magic, L'Arachel. Mostly healing magic, but I can use some attacks too.
I can't do that, Megumin. Also, why "unholy" magic?
Well, my father would probably be able to give me the ability to do that, but I haven't asked him because the butterfly has been enough.
Despite my abilities, I'm technically a human girl, Megumin.
I'm just a girl, Megumin. My dad gave me the ability to become a butterfly.
No, not exactly, Mae. My mom was a goddess, and my dad is the creator. But I'm just a girl
No. Well, yes, but... You don't sound very happy very happy about that, Mae.
Hm? What do you mean, Mae? What's wrong with me playing?
Oh? Should I not be, Mae? Why not?
Hey! I'm here to play the game too, Nami! Just hold on a minute...
What do you mean "wait for it to leave"? I'm here to play the game!
I'm not as frail as I may look as a butterfly, Nami! Though this form is preferable for actually doing things.
Well, I'm not as tough while I'm a butterfly, but it would still take more than that to actually hurt me, Nami.
Oh, this? I made it with my mother when I was very little, Rin.
I made it along with my mother, Rin. It's a nice memento of her.
I'm from Lunares, Jessie. Well, I think it's called the moon here.
I'm from the other side of the moon, Jessie! Though, I just call it Lunares.
Why are you being so mean?! What did I do? Wait, hold on...
This "bug" has feelings, you know! Stop being so mean!
Hnnnnn! Stop calling me a moth! You meanie! Rude! Jerk!
Why are you so rude!? What did I ever do to you?
I came to play because it seems like fun, Amy. That's all the reason I need, isn't it?
I'm playing because this seems like a fun game, Amy.
Uh... I don't know, Amy. I've never had sex before.
Well, I have friends that are boys and friends that are girls, but when it comes to sex? I don't know, I've never had sex before.
Hmm... probably the last time I used the hot springs at Origin Island, Amy. Though, I left my underwear on for that.
Well, I do feel strangely warm right now, Amy. Is that what feeling "turned on" is like?
"Fetish"? Well, being a butterfly makes traveling a lot easier, Saki.
Well, it's much easier to get from place to place as a butterfly, Saki.
Well, people say that I look a lot like my mother, Saki. So, I try to avoid that.
It's because I look a lot like my mother, Saki. And I don't want people mistaking me for her.
Well... my mother is a very special person, Saki. I'd rather not talk about it.
Well, famous might now be the right word, Saki. I'd rather not say.
You already knew, Miko?! That's amazing! How did you know?
You knew, Miko? I guess I didn't have to be worried.
"Give me faith"? You mean... my friends? I think we're all pretty different. And I think that's a good thing.
Faith? What do you mean, Miko?
Uh, I guess, Miko... you seem like a nice person.
I don't think there's anything wrong with it, Miko. You seem nice enough.
My sister? Well, she doesn't really care about people as much as I do. She won't hurt them, but she still has times where she manipulates their free will to make things easier for her.
I lost twice in a row? Talk about bad luck.
Twice in a row? Well, I guess no one can always be lucky.
Three times? Today must not be my day!
Three times in a row! I must be having a really bad day!

I thought that my luck was better than this. How have I lost four times in a row?
